TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DownloadProgressEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.DownloadProgress?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder.DownloadProgress?displayProperty=fullName> events.
Gets a value that represents the download progress of a bitmap, expressed as a percentage.
Docs.value: The progress, expressed as a percentage, to which a bitmap has been downloaded. The returned value will be between 1 and 100.
